name: timeMarkerRollOver
shortDescription: This event is fired when a user hovers over time marker.
description: This event is fired when a user hovers over time instant marker’s box or a time span marker’s rectangular area.

subparams.name: start
subparams.description: The UNIX timestamp corresponding to the start time of the bin in which the plot being clicked exists.

subparams.name: end
subparams.description: The UNIX timestamp corresponding to the end time of the bin in which the plot being clicked exists.

subparams.name: startText
subparams.description: The `start` timestamp represented in a human readable format.

subparams.name: endText
subparams.description: The `end` timestamp represented in a human readable format.

subparams.name: formatter
subparams.description: The formatter string used to format the `start` and `end` timestamps as `startText` and `endText` respectively.

subparams.name: label
subparams.description: An array of time marker labels.

subparams.name: type
subparams.description: The type of the time marker - `full` or `minimal`.

name: dataPlotClick
shortDescription: This event is fired when a data plot is clicked.
description: This event is fired when a data plot is clicked.
info: The payload data of event object will vary slightly based on plot type. Refer to parameter tables below to know more.

subparams.name: start
subparams.description: The UNIX timestamp corresponding to the start time of the bin in which the plot being clicked exists.

subparams.name: end
subparams.description: The UNIX timestamp corresponding to the end time of the bin in which the plot being clicked exists.

subparams.name: startText
subparams.description: The `start` timestamp represented in a human readable format.

subparams.name: endText
subparams.description: The `end` timestamp represented in a human readable format.

subparams.name: timeFormatter
subparams.description: The formatter string used to represent the `start`/`end` timestamps as `startText`/`endText`.

subparams.name: plotType
subparams.description: The type of the plot being clicked - `column`, `line`, `stepLine`, `smoothLine`, `area`, `stepArea`, `smoothArea`, `candlestick` or `ohlc`.

subparams.name: series
subparams.description: The name of the series that the plot belongs to.

subparams.name: seriesValue
subparams.description: The value of the `series` that the plot represents.

subparams.name: binUnit
subparams.description: The unit of time being represented in the bin - `millisecond`, `second`, `minute`, `hour`, `day`, `month` or `year`.

subparams.name: binMultiplier
subparams.description: The multiplier of the `binUnit` being displayed.

subparams.name: aggregation
subparams.description: The aggregation strategy used aggregate the values in the bin - `sum`, `average`, `min`, `max`, `first`, `last`.

params.name: Column, Line, Step Line, Smooth Line, Area, Step Area, Smooth Area
params.header: Column, Line, Step Line, Smooth Line, Area, Step Area, Smooth Area

subparams.name: measure
subparams.description: The name of the measure being represented by the plot.

subparams.name: binValue
subparams.description: The raw aggregated value being represented by the plot.

subparams.name: binValueFormatted
subparams.description: The aggregated `binValue` being displayed by the plot, after formatting.

subparams.name: measure
subparams.description: The name of the measure being represented as the `close` value of the plot.

subparams.name: measureOpen
subparams.description: The name of the measure being represented as the `open` value of the plot.

subparams.name: measureHigh
subparams.description: The name of the measure being represented as the `high` value of the plot.

subparams.name: measureLow
subparams.description: The name of the measure being represented as the `low` value of the plot.

subparams.name: measureClose
subparams.description: The name of the measure being represented as the `close` value of the plot.

subparams.name: binValue
subparams.description: The raw aggregated `close` value being represented by the plot.

subparams.name: binValueFormatted
subparams.description: The aggregated `close` value being displayed by the plot, after formatting.

subparams.name: binOpen
subparams.description: The raw aggregated `open` value being represented by the plot.

subparams.name: binOpenFormatted
subparams.description: The aggregated `open` value being displayed by the plot, after formatting.

subparams.name: binHigh
subparams.description: The raw aggregated `high` value being represented by the plot.

subparams.name: binHighFormatted
subparams.description: The aggregated `high` value being displayed by the plot, after formatting.

subparams.name: binLow
subparams.description: The raw aggregated `low` value being represented by the plot.

subparams.name: binLowFormatted
subparams.description: The aggregated `low` value being displayed by the plot, after formatting.

subparams.name: binClose
subparams.description: The raw aggregated `close` value being represented by the plot.

subparams.name: binCloseFormatted
subparams.description: The aggregated `close` value being displayed by the plot, after formatting.
